    • Method Detail

      • addStatistic

        public GlobalStatistics addStatistic(GlobalStatistics stat)
                              throws IllegalArgumentException
        Add a statistic to output.
        Parameters:
        stat - The statistic to add. Valid statistics are:

        • TOTAL_BURN_AREA
        • TOTAL_PERIMETER
        • EXTERIOR_PERIMETER
        • ACTIVE_PERIMETER
        • TOTAL_PERIMETER_CHANGE
        • TOTAL_PERIMETER_GROWTH_RATE
        • EXTERIOR_PERIMETER_CHANGE
        • EXTERIOR_PERIMETER_GROWTH_RATE
        • ACTIVE_PERIMETER_CHANGE
        • ACTIVE_PERIMETER_GROWTH_RATE
        • AREA_CHANGE
        • AREA_GROWTH_RATE
        • NUM_VERTICES
        • NUM_ACTIVE_VERTICES
        • CUMULATIVE_ACTIVE_VERTICES
        • CUMULATIVE_VERTICES
        • NUM_FRONTS
        • NUM_ACTIVE_FRONTS
        • MAX_ROS
        • MAX_CFB
        • MAX_CFC
        • MAX_SFC
        • MAX_TFC
        • MAX_FI
        • MAX_FL
        • TICKS
        • PROCESSING_TIME
        • GROWTH_TIME
        • DATE_TIME
        • SCENARIO_NAME
        • HFI
        • HCFB
        Returns:
        The statistic that was added.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If an invalid statistic is passed.

      • removeStatistic

        public boolean removeStatistic(GlobalStatistics statistic)
        Remove a statistic string from the statistics.
        Parameters:
        statistic - The statistic string to remove
